title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

1 point - the speaker: Mercury

2 points total the occasion (2 points for full answer, 1 point for partial answer).
Elements:

  • sent by Jupiter/gods

  • lingering in Carthage

  • Carthage/Rome

  • needs to fulfill destiny

  • first of two speeches by Mercury to Aeneas
